Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. params:

The release_time_from must be

- Monday (local time) for a weekly report

- The 1st day (local time) of a Month for a monthly report

","name":"release_time_from","sample":"1751302800","type":"int64","required":"True","key":"EyrKxee"},{"description":"

The release_time_to must be

- Sunday (local time) for a weekly report

- The last day (local time) of a Month for a monthly report

","name":"release_time_to","sample":"1753981199","type":"int64","required":"True","key":"CZRPjxf"},{"description":"
